scenario_text.value: Professor? Where are you going?
Ah, yes. To the shrine.
Kemonogami Shrine?

Yes. This is a critical moment and I realized
I better check something before we leave.

For example, Agumon, one of the murals in our
world had an image of you.
Of me?

The form and name written there match your
information exactly.

So if the names of other Kemonogami are also
written on that wall...
It might help us when we face them in battle!

Yes. But I’m not certain that the wall in our
world is the same as in the shrine.
And I’m not sure I could even read the marks.

Yet I need to be certain.
For you and for that Kemonogami.
Professor?

Ah, thanks. I already had breakfast, so no
need to worry about me.
I’ll be back later.
Okay...

(Did the professor mean Garurumon when he
said “that Kemonogami”?)

What should we do, Takuma?
Should we join the others?

Yeah.
We need to get ready to leave soon, too.

(Let’s leave the professor alone for a bit
longer.)
